tagline: Explore the flourishing world of Agriculture
subtagline: Cultivate growth. Empower futures. Navigate the agriculture domain with clarity and purpose.
introduction: Agriculture has now emerged as one of the popular courses after grade 12. Agriculture has different courses ranging from UG courses like B.Tech, B.Sc, B.S to Diploma courses. A few of the popular courses are Horticulture, Agricultural Engineering, Forestry, Sericulture. Agricultural courses aim to provide training to implement modern agricultural techniques and technologies in the real world scenario.

entrance_exams.overview: ICAR AIEEA is the entrance exam for admission in undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral agriculture and allied sciences programs. The AIEEA UG is the entrance exam for admission into undergraduate courses, which is administered by NTA through agriculture CUET exam from 2023.

exam_details.marking_scheme: Details not provided in the source

entrance_exams.overview: Tamil Nadu Agricultural University (TNAU) is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India and was established in the year 1971. The university is recognised by UGC and functions in accordance with the Tamil Nadu Directorate of Education. The University is offering 13 Undergraduate Degree Programs, 29 Postgraduate Degree Programs and 26 Doctoral Programs in 14 Colleges distributed in 11 campuses all over Tamil Nadu.
entrance_exams.admission_process: Seats are allotted via the TNAU counselling conducted by the university and the admissions are merit-based.
courses_offered: B. Sc. (Hons.) Food, Nutrition and Dietetics
entrance_exams.eligibility: Candidates must have secured a minimum percentage in 10+2 or equivalent from a recognised board as given below. (Details not provided in the source)

reservation.ex_servicemen: One seat for each of the degree programs in all constituent colleges
reservation.eminent_sportsmen: One seat for each of the degree programs in all constituent colleges
